channel.title: Make a ::home or a spawn point?
channel.description: Hi, I downloaded a Blank Source and Client. About 3 years ago, I shut my server down, and now I want to code again. I have coded out a few GlobalObjects and added some in. I was wondering if someone could please tell me how or send me a youtube video link on how to make the commands such as ::home and ::train ... When someone logs in they start with nothing. I don't even remember how give them a starter, such as 10M or something. Please let me know! Thanks!

item.title: Make a ::home or a spawn point?
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

No problemo, i suggest you learning basic java

Read full topic

item.title: Make a ::home or a spawn point?
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

Sup22211:

search for “customCommand” then you will see a method put it inside that method and it will work :eek:

THANKS! =]

item.title: Make a ::home or a spawn point?
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

[quote=“Sup22211, post:7, topic:515491”]If you want an edgeville as you home do this:
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Home”)){
teleportToX = 3087;
teleportToY = 3493;
}
no problem[/quote]

Do I add that anywhere in the client.java file, or does it have to be in a certain spot…?

Read full topic
